body: Update the clang compiler definition to use IBM XL Fortran compiler on CORAL systems (linux-rhel7-ppc64le).  This is needed because the llvm suite's `flang` compiler is not available for POWER platforms.  Related to #8311, #8388, #8391, #8392, #8393, #8394.
title: Update the clang compiler definition to use IBM XL Fortran compiler
